Table.SCRIPT: A lack of sleep can make [{concentrating}] hard for kids. On the other hand, getting enough sleep [{enables}] kids to concentrate better. They can think clearly for longer [{periods}] of time. Studies show that kids who get enough sleep are more likely to do better in school. Sometimes it’s difficult to fall asleep. Luckily, some simple habits can fix this problem. [{Exercising}] regularly is helpful. Going to bed and waking up at the same time helps your body keep a regular sleep [{schedule}]. Kids who follow these habits are likely to [{improve}] their [{performance}] in school.
Table.TITLE: Sleeping Habits
